code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navbar.css';import logo from'../Assets/logo.png';import cart_icon from'../Assets/cart_icon.png';import{ShopContext}from'../../Context/ShopContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[menu,setMenu]=useState("Shop");const{getTotalCartItems}=useContext(ShopContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"HAPPYHAUL"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{onClick:()=>setMenu("Shop"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",style:{textDecoration:"none",color:"inherit"},children:"Shop"}),menu==="Shop"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}):null]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{onClick:()=>setMenu("Mens"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/mens",style:{textDecoration:"none",color:"inherit"},children:"Men"}),menu==="Mens"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}):null]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{onClick:()=>setMenu("Womens"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/womens",style:{textDecoration:"none",color:"inherit"},children:"Women"}),menu==="Womens"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}):null]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{onClick:()=>setMenu("Kids"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/kids",style:{textDecoration:"none",color:"inherit"},children:"Kids"}),menu==="Kids"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}):null]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-login-cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:cart_icon,alt:"cart icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-cart-count",children:getTotalCartItems()})]})]});};export default Navbar;
